name: Fulton Playground
description: Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Clubhouse - Accessible Hard Courts - Accessible Picnic Area - Accessible Restroom - Community Room(s) - Outdoor Basketball Court - Picnic Area - Playground - Restrooms - Tennis The clubhouse hosts a variety of programs and classes, including an after-school program, teen nights and tiny tots. Facilities include a sheltered sand playground, basketball and tennis courts and picnic tables.
